author: gstein
msg: auto-rebuild the exports file when a header changes

author: gstein
msg: pick up exported vars from APR, and export some of our own.
(in particular, this lets us compile/link testdbm successfully with a
threaded APR because we pick up the thread compile/linkflags; our vars
include stuff like -lgdbm when APRUTIL is configured using --with-dbm=gdbm)

author: gstein
msg: fix up the include paths for the new include/private directory

author: gstein
msg: (symbol renaming will probably occur as part of the big APRUTIL rename)

author: dreid
msg: Add Apache's PrintPath and change buildconf.sh to use it.
This allows BeOS to configure apr-util.
